Message.Title: $240 is in view for 2013
Message.Msg: As soon as IBM produces some chip with its nanotube technology, the price will jump 20%.

Topic.Title: IBM should have been a $600+ stock, not Apple or Google...

Message.Msg: But it is not. IBM has always had a knife in it's back and that is IBM MANAGEMENT. Remove that and you might get real visionaries.

Message.Title: Must be in red today
Message.Msg: HPQ leads IBM to get lower than $188 today. IBM will give back its at least 65% gains from yesterday

Message.Msg: again. though small lunch since HPQ cap is relatively small

Message.Title: On the next dip which could be
Message.Msg: or shall I say should be Monday, I am adding to my April 200 calls.
Tea Baggers and Republicans, please take notice, paranoia is covered as a medical condition under Obama Care, get help you guys certainly need it.

Message.Title: Bernanke just let the cat out of bag!
Message.Msg: We go over the cliff 4% cut in GDP If we dont probably 2% cut in GDP You didnt think those payroll taxes would be cut FOREver did you? RECESSION NO MATTER WHAT!

Message.Title: No one makes money when he/she panics
Message.Msg: And the worse thing to do is to listen to those who are spreading panic. There will be a solution one way or another and people who are smart can see it and benefit from it.

Message.Title: Stocks will be green for this week
Everyone is waiting for a solution to the cliff. IF they
Message.Msg: stall and kick the can down the road, market will drop. IF they come up with ANY grand plan,market will pop 500 pts and IBM will be up over $5. I don't see BamBam giving in at all. So it's up to Boehner, otherwise,it's a long way down from here.

Topic.Title: Everyone is waiting for a solution to the cliff. IF they

Message.Msg: everybody is going off the cliff with this. Its a no brainer. Either a comprimise will be reached or they'll kick the can down the road. Either option or choice will not effect the market any more than putting it into a temporary neutral state ( sideways movement). IMHO

Topic.Title: Everyone is waiting for a solution to the cliff. IF they

Message.Msg: I agree. I'm optimistic, I think they reach a deal. And IBM up $5 the first day and then another $15 by February. IBM should be $400 plus.

Topic.Title: Everyone is waiting for a solution to the cliff. IF they

Message.Msg: There will a solution since GOP don't power to block it. Tea party is being kicked out. Anyway, the chickens will be losers again.

Message.Title: Tax increase will not affect 98% of people and investors
Message.Msg: The 2% are making so much noise. Don't be fool by 2%.
